example: The intelligent robot can solve complex problems.
The young entrepreneur started a successful tech company.
They train employees to improve their skills.
An honest person always tells the truth.
People often donate money to charity organizations.
The celebrity attended the charity event.
Teaching is a rewarding occupation.
Overcoming adversity makes people stronger.
The company needs more capital to expand. / Beijing is the capital of China.
We had an informal meeting to discuss ideas.
She writes in her journal every day. / The scientific journal publishes new research.
We need to space the plants evenly. / There is limited space in the small apartment.
There are plentiful opportunities in this field.
They went on a long voyage across the ocean.
We held a farewell party for our friend.
They share the same interest in painting.
Good teachers have effective teaching methods.
Friends should offer emotional support to each other.
The children like to play similar games at recess.
A scholar usually has a wide knowledge of many subjects.

english: help a person to build a good character
chinese: 帮助一个人塑造良好的品格
example: Good education helps a person to build a good character.
Educational leaders play a key role in school development.
Teachers pass on knowledge to their students.
The school aims to provide comprehensive lessons.

english: be full of bright ideas and plans
example: The young team is full of bright ideas and plans.
The doctor has years of experience in treating patients.

english: feel comfortable working with each other
example: The team members feel comfortable working with each other.
Praise can boost confidence in children.
A good discussion allows for varied views.

english: make studying fun, interactive, and social
chinese: 让学习变得有趣、互动性强且具有社交性
example: New teaching methods make studying fun, interactive, and social.
